supplyDemandQuery.title: demand balances by crop commodity
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector']//*[@type='input' and (@name='regional corn' or @name='regional fibercrop' or @name='regional misccrop' or @name='regional oilcrop' or @name='regional othergrain' or @name='regional palmfruit' or @name='regional rice' or @name='regional root_tuber' or @name='regional sugarcrop' or @name='regional wheat' or @name='FodderGrass' or @name='FodderHerb' or @name='Forest' or @name='Pasture')]/ demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: demand balances by meat and dairy commodity
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector']//*[@type='input' and (@name='Beef' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat' or @name='OtherMeat_Fish' or @name='Dairy')]/ demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: meat and dairy prices
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='SheepGoat' or @name='Pork' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Poultry')]/ cost/text()

emissionsQueryBuilder.title: specific nonCO2 emissions by resource production

supplyDemandQuery.title: Crop exports
supplyDemandQuery.comments: All crop exports stored under region name USA

supplyDemandQuery.title: primary energy consumption by region (direct equivalent)

gdpQueryBuilder.title: GDP per capita PPP by region

supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='SheepGoat' or @name='Pork' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Poultry')]/ cost/text()
